pages.text: Redstone Heat Cables allow redstone interaction with heat. They are made by surrounding any heat cable with 8 redstone in the crafting grid. A Redstone Heat Cable functions like a normal heat cable, except it only connects to other heat cables or machines while it has a redstone signal. A comparator can also be used with a Redstone Heat Cable to measure the temperature.

pages.title: Example Crafting
pages.text: The equation for converting °C to redstone strength is as follows: redstone = 15 * (273 + °C) / (273 + insulator melting point). This equation rounds down. Therefore, this will never reach 15 because at that point the cable melts.
